title: Hour 2 - (05-26-20)
itunes:title: Hour 2 - (05-26-20)
description:
Dan talks about the new audio that confirmed that Michael Jordan did not want Isiah Thomas on the Dream Team. Dan says that the real story is that Chuck Daly did not want Isiah on the team either.

content:encoded:
Dan talks about the new audio that confirmed that Michael Jordan did not want Isiah Thomas on the Dream Team. Dan says that the real story is that Chuck Daly did not want Isiah on the team either.
